column1: Akividu is a town in West Godavari district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is in between the twin cities of Bhimavaram and Eluru of Andhra Pradesh.

column1: Akividu railway station is categorized as a Non-Suburban Grade-5 (NSG-5) station in the Vijayawada railway division and is one of the busiest train stations. Its main exports are fish and prawns.
